name: Ext_R3_GuidanceResponse_requestId
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.GuidanceResponse.requestId for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents GuidanceResponse.requestId from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/GuidanceResponse|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The id of the request associated with this response, if any
element.definition: The id of the request associated with this response. If an id was given as part of the request, it will be reproduced here to enable the requester to more easily identify the response in a multi-request scenario.
element.comment: `GuidanceResponse.requestIdentifier` maps to R5 `GuidanceResponse.requestIdentifier`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
